Lab Location

An Lab is in Hana Science Hall (building B) of the Korea University, Seoul Campus (Google Map):

Office: Room 168, Floor 1, Hana Science Hall building B Lab: Room 259, Floor 2, Hana Science Hall building B 126-15 Anamdong 5(o)-ga, Seongbuk-gu, Seoul, South Korea
